text: It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Valorant, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the GIGABYTE AERO 15S OLED SA-7US5130SH 15.6" 4K AMOLED 60 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. The screen brightness is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Had several issues with the GIGABYTE AERO 15S OLED SA-7US5130SH 15.6" 4K AMOLED 60 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop since day one. overheats and the battery life feels cheap. Performance in gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Had several issues with the GIGABYTE AERO 15S OLED SA-7US5130SH 15.6" 4K AMOLED 60 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop since day one. Wi-Fi drops intermittently and the port selection feels cheap. Performance in gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Had several issues with the GIGABYTE AERO 15S OLED SA-7US5130SH 15.6" 4K AMOLED 60 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop since day one. performance throttles under load and the trackpad feels cheap. Performance in streaming games is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1660 is good, but I expected a bit more from the fan noise on the GIGABYTE AERO 15S OLED SA-7US5130SH 15.6" 4K AMOLED 60 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.
